For each field of study, subject and in the Educational Sciences, the maximum number of credit points that can be recognised are those from the corresponding field of study in the Bachelor's degree at the Universität zu Köln including Educational Sciences component and the course profile Teacher Training at German Lower Secondary Schools, Intermediate Schools and Comprehensive Schools.

                                                Primary Education, Primary School Pedagogy

Teaching degree via: primary schools (Grundschulen)secondary schools at all kind of schools (Sekunddarstufe I, classes 5-10)
Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: The Bachelor's degree in Education and Teaching is aimed at students interested in a career in teaching at primary schools OR intermediate schools and German lower secondary schools. The Bachelor's degree course qualifies students to enter a profession. Professional qualification, particularly for activities within the professional fields of education associated with school and non-school education in the pre-school, primary and secondary I sectors, is based on the acquisition of well-founded academic skills related to Art, the respective combination subject and to Educational Sciences.The course of study is divided into two teaching subjects, whereby Art must be chosen as one of the subjects for the later career goal of TEACHING AT PRIMARY SCHOOLS, alongside English, German or Mathematics.In the case of the later career goal of TEACHING AT INTERMEDIATE SCHOOLS AND GERMAN LOWER SECONDARY SCHOOLS, the study of Art is compulsory unless German, English, French (only with focus on German lower secondary schools), Mathematics, Music or Physics is chosen as an alternative. Depending on the respective career goal, Art can be combined with the subjects of Biology (career goal of teaching at intermediate schools and German lower secondary schools only), German, English, Protestant Religion, French (career goal of teaching at German lower secondary schools only), History (career goal of teaching at intermediate schools and German lower secondary schools only), Islamic Religion, Catholic Religion, Mathematics, Music, Physics, General Studies (career goal of teaching at primary schools only), Sport or Textile Design. The course of study with the core curriculum (KCL-BEU) also includes an inter-disciplinary professional qualification area that must be completed. The course of study involves two placements of at least nine weeks in total.

overview_info.Application Deadline for Beginning Stude:
20.05.2020 —
                                        20.08.2020
                                                                        Für Bewerberinnen und Bewerber, welche ihre Hochschulzugangsberechtigung (HZB) im Sommer 2020 erwerben, gilt als Bewerbungsfrist der 20. August 2020.
Für Bewerberinnen und Bewerber, welche die Eignungsprüfung für Kunst, Musik und Sport noch ablegen werden, gilt als Bewerbungsfrist der 20. August 2020.
Bewerberinnen und Bewerber, welche ihre Hochschulzugangsberechtigung (HZB) vor dem Jahr 2020 erworben haben, werden gebeten, sich bis zum 15. Juli 2020 zu bewerben.
